channel.title: Plotly on Antoine VILLATTE
channel.description: Recent content in Plotly on Antoine VILLATTE

item.title: Project 1 - Interactive maps
item.description: Here, I built two interactive maps to familiarize myself with the leaflet and plotly packages to make data products and presentations : Link to an interactive GDP world map made with plotly Link to an interactive map of France and its top 10 cities made with leaflet
